Simplified Blog Setup

Posted on October 29, 2015 by Noah Ryan

The blog setup has been simplified a bit. Now I build the website locally, where I can test and commit if I want, and then I just copy the contents to the linode server. This is less ideal then pushing a version to the server, but its easier and lowers the barrier to entry for writing new posts
